title: Drone strike on Russian fleet halts Navy Day festival in Crimea; Zelenskyy calls for Donetsk region evacuations: Ukraine live updates
content:
1. Drone strike on Russian fleet halts Navy Day festival in Crimea; Zelenskyy calls for Donetsk region evacuations: Ukraine live updates  USA TODAY
  2. Mykolaiv in Ukraine hit with heavy shelling as Putin threatens 'lightning speed' response to interference  CNN
  3. Ukraine attacks Russian Black Sea Fleet headquarters  Reuters
  4. Drone detonates explosive at Russia’s Black Sea navy HQ  Fox News
  5. Russian official says Ukraine carried out drone attack on Black Sea fleet HQ  Yahoo News
contentSnippet:
Drone strike on Russian fleet halts Navy Day festival in Crimea; Zelenskyy calls for Donetsk region evacuations: Ukraine live updates  USA TODAY
Mykolaiv in Ukraine hit with heavy shelling as Putin threatens 'lightning speed' response to interference  CNN
Ukraine attacks Russian Black Sea Fleet headquarters  Reuters
Drone detonates explosive at Russia’s Black Sea navy HQ  Fox News
Russian official says Ukraine carried out drone attack on Black Sea fleet HQ  Yahoo News

localize.title: ロシア艦隊へのドローン攻撃でクリミアの海軍記念日祭を中止、ゼレンスキーはドネツク州の避難を呼びかけ。ウクライナのライブアップデート
俄罗斯舰队遭到无人机袭击，克里米亚的海军节停止；泽伦斯基呼吁顿涅茨克地区撤离。乌克兰实时更新
俄羅斯艦隊遭到無人機襲擊，克里米亞的海軍節停止；澤倫斯基呼籲頓涅茨克地區撤離。烏克蘭實時更新
